document_text: Postdoctoral Researcher | Postdoctoral Researcher The Computer Architecture and System Laboratory (CASTL) at Florida State University has a postdoctoral researcher position on large-scale parallel computing and data analytics. This is a full time, two-year, renewable position. The successful candidate must have earned a PhD in computer science or related disciplines and at least one first-author research publication in a reputable systems conference or journal. To apply, visit: http://hr.fsu.edu , click Job Opportunities , then enter 43971 as the job ID. Questions regarding the position can be directed to Prof. Weikuan Yu ( yuw@cs.fsu.edu ).
